FuncDef: This command activates and deactivates the bin group. Only the description of the bin group can be modified when the bin group is in a "no shutdown" state. No other changes can be made while the bin group is active. The bin group can only be shutdown and modified when all references in the various PM Sessions or individual tests have been shutdown. If an active PM session is referencing the bin-group, it will generate an error indicating there are x number of active tests referencing the bin-group, and it cannot be shutdown.
